---

Lightning Talk: Do You Love or Hate Your C++ Build System? - Helen Altshuler - CppCon 2024
---

This interactive talk that will explore the speaker and audience's journeys with build systems from make based to Bazel, discussing challenges and expectations of modern build systems. 
---

Sponsored by JetBrains: https://www.jetbrains.com/clion/
---

Helen Altshuler

Helen Altshuler is the CEO and co-founder of EngFlow, the build acceleration platform for CMake, Bazel, AOSP. Helen started her career as a C++ engineer at JPMorgan, then eng director; the CTO of a fintech startup; and engineering leader at Google, working on Google Maps and developer tooling, including driving adoption of Bazel. 
---

CppCon is the annual, week-long face-to-face gathering for the entire C++ community. The conference is organized by the C++ community for the community. You will enjoy inspirational talks and a friendly atmosphere designed to help attendees learn from each other, meet
title: Lightning Talk: Do You Love or Hate Your C++ Build System? - Helen Altshuler - CppCon 2024
